entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
